## About
I am a statistician with expertise in longitudinal and multilevel data analysis, causal inference, missing data techniques, and Bayesian methods. I hold an M.S. in Statistics from the [University of New Mexico](https://www.unm.edu/) in 2025 and a double major B.Sc. in Mathematics and Statistics from the [University of Ghana](https://www.ug.edu.gh/) in 2021.

My work focuses on developing and applying rigorous statistical approaches to solve complex public health challenges. I am passionate about transforming data into meaningful insights through advanced methodology, careful analysis, and clear communication.

:::
